hero_subtitle: Everything around a successful and effective Embedded System Development
intro_paragraph: ChipGlobe designs and integrates complete embedded systems that connect hardware and software seamlessly. Our services cover the full development cycle — from board design and firmware to system integration, testing, and validation — ensuring performance, reliability, and efficiency.
intro_paragraph2: We support a wide range of industries, including automotive, industrial automation, telecommunications, medical, and consumer electronics. ChipGlobe helps clients build smart, connected, and dependable products that reach the market faster and perform flawlessly.
service3: Integration of sensors, communication interfaces, and control systems
expertise_paragraph: ChipGlobe offers a comprehensive range of embedded systems services tailored to the needs of various industries, including automotive, industrial automation, IoT, and more. We develop custom software solutions for embedded systems—covering low-level drivers, firmware, and middleware—with a strong focus on reliability, scalability, and efficiency. Our team designs hardware and software components in parallel to ensure optimal integration and functionality.
expertise_paragraph2: We provide both real-time operating system (RTOS) development and bare-metal solutions, depending on application-specific speed and control requirements. Emphasizing energy efficiency and real-time performance, we optimize firmware for a wide range of microcontrollers and processors. From hardware to software, we manage full integration and perform comprehensive testing, including automated validation setups.
